record.id: field.name="cls.control" and file.name="cm3tcatphase" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: cls.control
record.file.name: cm3tcatphase

brief.brief: Determines whether an operator has Close authority.
In order to have Close Authority, the operator must have the necessary Change Management Capability Word and this expression must evaluate to true.

detail.detail: This field allows Close authority to be dependent on a particular condition in addition to the normal Capability words.
Close control is an extension of the Change Management Capability Word cm3t.close.
This example enables Close Authority only when the full name of the current operator ($lo.ufname) matches the contents of the assign.to field in the Task:
